title: Lunar revel mystery box?
body:
Where is it? has it been released yet? I'm trying to gift my friend it (hoping he gets firecracker Jinx and i can get a summoner icon) but i cant find it
its probably really obvious and ill look like a fool for asking, does it automatically add the double chance into normal gifting? but it is advertised at a different price so i dunno.
can anyone help?

replies.body: lunar reveal hasn't started yet, starts on the 17th from memory

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5QjALKPI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-11T11:31:54.716+0000)
>
> lunar reveal hasn't started yet, starts on the 17th from memory

http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/lunar-revel-2015/#home
???

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5QjALKPI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-02-11T12:37:49.507+0000)
>
> http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/lunar-revel-2015/#home
> ???

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-new-year-these-lunar-revel-sales
actually the 24th except for the sets

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5QjALKPI,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-02-11T22:44:31.688+0000)
>
> http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-new-year-these-lunar-revel-sales
> actually the 24th except for the sets

it's already started though. it ends on the 24th
i'm pretty sure it's just a normal mystery box. they're the same price.
